      • checkDuplicatedSchedule

        public boolean checkDuplicatedSchedule(MovieSchedule sch)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       java.text.ParseException
        Check if schedule is duplicated during movie schedule creation, if it is, redirect to update page. The condition of duplicated is if the same movie has the same movie listing that are of now showing and coming soon status. * A movie listing is not duplicated if one of the same movie is showing on a platinum suite and one isn't. A movie listing is not duplicated if one of the same movie had already ended its showing. This is to make sure that cinema staff can rerun new showing after it a list has ended.
        Parameters:
        sch -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.text.ParseException
